description:
Get to the end of the trail, whether you're hiking it or riding it. From trail riding to enduro, these shoes keep you on top of things. The reinforced toe bumper and padded ankle collar and sidewall add durability and protection, and grippy rubber soles keep your feet where you want them when walking or not yet clipped in.

  • Synthetic leather upper sheds mud and snow while perforations let heat escape
  • Medium-stiff midsole dampens shock but maintains comfortable flex
  • Moulded toe cap protects you from roots and rocks in the trail
  • Low profile rubber sole is stable and high traction
  • Compatible with 2-bolt cleats with expanded cleat adjustment
  • Pedal Channel provides stability on pedals when not clipped in
name: Shimano AM503 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
